doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 39 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 156[Air Date: 6/24/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 39 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 156[Air Date: 6/24/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. Mayor Ed Koch reads proclamation declaring Gay Pride Week 19852. COMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp3. Highlights from Gay Pride 19844. Sports5. Healthline: Interview with Dr. Dan William on need for mandatory AIDS testing
The Right Stuff:1. Current Events with Brandon Judell2. COMMERCIAL: "Mandate" Magazine3. Sybil Ophthalmia Bruncheon - "Picnic on the West Side Piers"4. COMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity with Dear Abby5. Broadway Confidential - Current theater news6. COMMERCIAL: The Islanders Club7. Terry Miller interviews Robert Rosenberg. Topic: "Before Stonewall"
